title: Hin and Veg
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Organic, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Hin & Veg is a Hamburg vegetarian restaurant. Small, mostly take-out with several small tables in the back. Serves typical German and Indian fast foods: veggie bratwurst, veggie curry-wurst, veggie burgers, pizza, pasta and Indian curry dishes, and more. All dishes vegan upon request. Confirmed open as of Sept 2011.
